plot: A mother accidently kills her son while trying to prevent him from dating a woman whom, unknown to him, is his sister.
title: Woerobji anhda
plot_es: A mother accidently kills her son while trying to prevent him from dating a woman whom, unknown to him, is his sister.
plot_en: A mother accidently kills her son while trying to prevent him from dating a woman whom, unknown to him, is his sister.
